topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539405286368722a20530200#post_539405286368722a20530200
It's like final fantasy. But instead of turn based battles, the battles are like fighting games.

I recommend Tales of Symphonia, Tales of the Abyss, and Tales of Vesperia first. Tales of Phantasia, Tales of Destiny, and tales of Eternia if you are into those old 2D gaming.

topics.body:
I just landed from my flight and it's great to be back on the ground. 
Now here's something different.

If people never did a certain something, it's probable that someone else will at a later date or did something else to substitute it, with different ideas and theories.

In example, if the Wright Brothers never discovered the airplane, someone else in the world will or maybe discover a flying machine that can substitute the airplane with a different design and principles.

So, what are your thoughts?
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539406df6368721cb3c00300#post_539406df6368721cb3c00300
[bq="trashboat"]"Macross 7":http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vj7cux9ddWE
[/bq]
Dude!  DUDE! *DUDE!*

I remember that; didn't he fuck a alien or something?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53943e73636872763a500500#post_53943e73636872763a500500

Nope unfortunately he only kissed one and then she went nuts and flew off into space or some crap. 

Macross 7 was okay in terms of anime, but it really jumped away from what I thought was Macross sort of, I mean come on it features a guy who's more interested in singing than anything else. He doesn't seem to really give a damn about everyone else at first.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539445e0636872757c350200#post_539445e0636872757c350200
Macross 7 is considered to be the G gundam of Macross, Not like the others, But Not Bad on its own merits

Anyway, 7 is the one I'm most familiar with (I'm more into super robots)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539446b56368727841e20100#post_539446b56368727841e20100
Macross summarized in one sentence, "Singing for some reason saves the human race even when the aliens don't have a means of hearing sound".

Well it could be worse, though I do wonder, where the hell is the series going now? Are they continuing on with Macross or are they finished with it?
